oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Light source preferences in laying hens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heikkilä, Matti
Gunnarsson, Stefan
Valros, Anna
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this experiment was to study the light source preference in laying hens reared in either artificial or natural light.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Heikkilä, Matti; Gunnarsson, Stefan and Valros, Anna (2006) Light source preferences in laying hens. In: Proceedings of the 18th Nordic symposium of the International Society for Applied Ethology, Finnish Society for Applied Ethology, p. 13.
